item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, March 8, 2025 at 6:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Feds Link $150M Cyberheist to 2022 LastPass Hacks (195 points | 102 comments)
2. Postgres Just Cracked the Top Fastest Databases for Analytics (42 points | 5 comments)
3. Auntie PDF – an open source app built using Mistral OCR (69 points | 23 comments)
4. Show HN: Open-Source DocumentAI with Ollama (68 points | 4 comments)
5. Mountains, Cliffs, and Caves: A Guide to Using Perlin Noise for Procedural Gen (53 points | 8 comments)
6. Polars Cloud: The Distributed Cloud Architecture to Run Polars Anywhere (179 points | 62 comments)
7. A game of learning your homelab into a cyberpunk mystery adventure (29 points | 7 comments)
8. Introducing command And commandfor In HTML (302 points | 178 comments)
9. My legal last name prevents me from completing my Twitch affiliate onboarding (38 points | 15 comments)
10. The German language broke my website (17 points | 35 comments)
11. Take It Down Act: A Flawed Attempt to Protect Victims That'll Lead to Censorship (87 points | 13 comments)
12. Vtm: Text-Based Desktop Environment (218 points | 49 comments)
13. Optimistic Locking in B-Trees (127 points | 32 comments)
14. The features of Python's help() function (96 points | 40 comments)
15. How did places like Bell Labs know how to ask the right questions? (2023) (82 points | 54 comments)
16. Unleashed Recompiled: PC port of the Xbox 360 version of Sonic Unleashed (65 points | 12 comments)
17. Ask HN: Do your eyes bug you even though your prescription is "correct"? (176 points | 196 comments)
18. (Reasonably) secure Azure Pipelines on-prem deployments (3 points | discuss)
19. Athena spacecraft declared dead after toppling over on moon (197 points | 258 comments)
20. Age Verification Laws: A Backdoor to Surveillance (389 points | 279 comments)
21. Portable MRI Scans Patients for Signs of Stroke (35 points | 13 comments)
22. GeoCities in 1995: Building a Home Page on the Internet (99 points | 55 comments)
23. Strobelight: A profiling service built on open source technology (143 points | 44 comments)
24. Integrated sensing and communication based on space-time-coding metasurfaces (26 points | 3 comments)
25. ParadeDB (YC S23) Is Hiring a Rust Database Engineer ( | hide)
26. Microsoft is plotting a future without OpenAI (351 points | 331 comments)
27. Letta: Letta is a framework for creating LLM services with memory (25 points | discuss)
28. Coffee reduces risk of Type 2 Diabetes; okay to add cream, but not sweetener (32 points | 21 comments)
29. 'Next-Level' Chaos Traces the True Limit of Predictability (37 points | 9 comments)
30. Exploring the Hybrid Debian GNU/KFreeBSD Distribution (6 points | discuss)
